mapper.select: SELECT c.brandName smallBrandName, b.brandName bigBrandName, subject, m1.userName writeName, s.stopNum, r.regDate, r.communityNum, r.content, m2.userName sendName, notifyContent, p.status FROM reply r JOIN replyStop s ON r.replyNum = s.replyNum JOIN member m1 ON r.userCode = m1.userCode JOIN member m2 ON s.userCode = m2.userCode JOIN community c ON r.communityNum = c.communityNum JOIN replyStatus p ON s.stopNum = p.stopNum JOIN brandCategory b ON c.brandNum = b.brandNum WHERE p.status = #{status} ORDER BY s.stopNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM replyStop r JOIN replyStatus s ON r.stopNum = s.stopNum WHERE status = ${status}
mapper.update: UPDATE replyStatus SET status = #{status} WHERE stopNum = #{stopNum}
